message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $120. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but $60 is quite a bit below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $90 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $75?
